Marauder looked back at l=
amia, his face showing for a moment a
surprise and then acceptance. =93Ahh =
yes=94 he said, covering his surprise
with a smile. =93A minion without amb=
ition, how very . . . ah . . .
refreshing.=94

Marauder led Lamia to what a=
ppeared at first to be an ornate balcony
of some type, one that was positio=
ned on the edge of the chasm and
that over looked the super heated magma th=
at cooled itself several
miles beneath them. However as they stepped onto t=
he platform,
Marauder turned and the =91balcony=92 began to lower itself do=
wn the very
wall of the chasm, into the depths below them.

The balcony cam=
e to a stop, depositing them on a level much lower than
before. The air her=
e was hotter, and filled with sulfur as well as
other toxic gasses. The hal=
l here was also large, its walls smooth,
the stone so slick they looked muc=
h like glass.

As Marauder led Lamia down the hall, different tunnels leadi=
ng off to
other areas branched off as they walked. Eventually they came a l=
arge
outcropping of stone and rock, one that protruded out and overlooked a=

very large chamber nearly 50 meters below them.

=93Here we are!=94 Maraud=
er said as he gestured his hand at the chamber
that lay beneath them.

In t=
he chamber metal power cables running along the walls like some
dark metall=
ic snake, each of them connected to what appeared to be
recharge chambers, =
at least ten of them were visible - all of the
chambers appeared to be lit,=
 but if they had an occupant it was
difficult to tell.

=93Each of these ch=
ambers holds a soldier that will be link of the chain
that will defeat the =
Cybertronians that litter this world like
refuse.=94 Marauder looked back a=
t Lamia, =93and here we are at the
precipice of victory.=94 He said.

As th=
ey talked a figure strode across the floor beneath them, the one
identified=
 as Dirge earlier. He walked to the center of the room, a
place where many =
cables came together.

=93Soon! Soon, we will be able to wake all of our so=
ldiers, but now we
will awaken the first.=94

Beneath them Dirge activated =
some sort of control and four of the
chambers were lit even brighter as pow=
er was fed into them. The
interior of the pods swirled with light and energ=
y as something seemed
to come into being within them. Then with a sudden bl=
ink the power of
these pods shut down, the doors clicked and then slid open=
, allowing a
single figure to emerge from each.

=93Greetings!=94 Maruader =
called from above to them. =93Who are you, and who
do you serve?=94

The fi=
rst one to answer stepped forward, his movement all aggression
and force. H=
is armor was predominantly green with yellow on the legs
and arms. Just the=
 look of him was large and strong. =93You can call me
BARRAGE!=94 he said, =
=93Because when I lay down my firepower, nobody gets
up!=94

The next one t=
o move is hued in similar colors, with giant insect like
wings rising from =
his back. His red optics look up at Marauder and
Lamia, =93You can call me =
RANSACK!=94 this one said, his voice dark and
ominous, =93and what doesn=92=
t fall to him will fall to me!=94

Another stepped forward, this one hued i=
n supple brown armor, great
horn like structures rising from his back. =93W=
hat=92s mine is mine . . .=94
He said as he chuckled =93. . . and what=92s =
yours is mine as well.=94 He
folded his arms behind his back as if hiding s=
omething, =93You can call
me =93CHOPSHOP!=94 he said, another slight chuckl=
e escaping him as he
stopped and looked up as well.  =93And you=92ll find o=
ut what I can do.=94

The last one to step forward seemed somehow more aggr=
essive then the
others, more sure of himself. Even as he moved forward, the=
 others
seemed to give way, almost as if they didn=92t what to touch him. H=
e was
green and orange with what looked like a horn or stinger that rose
fr=
om his head. =93I am VENOM.=94 He said, his voice deep and powerful,
carryi=
ng across the room, =93and I command these soldiers.=94 At Venom=92s
glance=
 the others, they each nod once and then looked back up.

Venom looked up a=
t Marauder, =93And we serve you Lord Marauder, you and
the might of UNICRON=
!=94

Above them Marauder nodded back at Venom and then the others, =93Yes =
my
soldiers, this is only the beginning. There are more that I must
bring.=
=94 He smiled evilly, =93Yes, more indeed.=94

BWAHAHAHAHAHAHA
